app.name: Agent Chat
app.short_description: Show Zendesk Widget inside Zendesk Support
app.long_description: Show Zendesk Widget inside Zendesk Support so Agents can chat and/or using Widget features without leaving their environment.
app.installation_instructions: Install > Provide Widget Key in the app settings, for example: `3e9cab8b-9836-4495-9bec-SOMETHING`. Provide stringified JSON for chat departments settings like `{"select":"Development & Performance"}`

widget_key.label: Widget key
widget_key.helpText: Provide Widget Key in the app settings, for example: `3e9cab8b-9836-4495-9bec-SOMETHING`. Find it on your Widget snippet.

chat_department_settings.label: Zendesk Chat Departments JSON
chat_department_settings.helpText: Provide stringified JSON for chat departments settings like `{"select":"Development & Performance"}`. Chat department will be preset to this value. You can include `enabled` array to define visibility of departments.
